message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a price that I think is very competitive. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1,100,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value we both see in it.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $1,050,000. This is my best and final offer for now.
